tool_description: An API showing all the latest malaria news in ghana
name: Malaria Live
title: Malaria Live

api_list.name: Get news from Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get news about malaria in Africa from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://malaria-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/3news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaria-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://malaria-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "malaria-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Malaria News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about malaria in Africa
